A '''poisonous potato block''' is a [[:Category:Compacted blocks|compacted block]] made of [[poisonous potato]]es in [[24w14potato]].

== Obtaining ==
=== Breaking ===
A poisonous potato block can be broken using anything, but a [[pickaxe]] is the fastest. Poisonous potato blocks always drop themselves when mined.
{{breaking row|horizontal=1|Poisonous Potato Block|pickaxe|hidecopper=1}}
Note: No version exists with both copper tools and this block, but the breaking time can be calculated from the block's hardness.

=== Natural generation ===
Poisonous potato blocks generate naturally as part of [[potato geode]]s.
